## Frequently Asked Questions
 
#### What can I use as a test IP?
 
Tampa, FL: 204.9.39.11 (Great for Latin American customers)
London, UK: 54.37.244.181
 
#### Do you own your hardware?

We own our hardware in the Tampa location, London, UK is currently leased.

#### What are your bandwidth providers?
 
Our current providers are CenturyLink/Level3, Cogent, XO/Verizon and WOW.
 
### What hardware do you use?

We currently use the following hardware:
Tampa, FL: Xeon E5-2650s with Enterprise grade SAS SSDs
London, UK: Ryzen 5's with NVMe SSD

#### Where are your servers located?
 
Our VPS are based out of Tampa, FL and London, UK. Additional locations can be requested and will be added.

#### Is CPU Passthrough enabled?

We have CPU Passthrough enabled for all plans by default.
 
#### Do you provide refunds?
 
Yes, you are eligible for a refund if you cancel and request it during the first 30 days.

#### What kind of software is not allowed?
 
We do not allow virtual currency mining, gaming servers, or IRC servers to be run on our VPS. Please note, however, that this is not an exhaustive list and that you should check our Terms of Service or contact us if you have any questions about what is allowed.
